headline: Homebuilder sentiment rises, Exor rejects bid on Juventus stake
summary: Market Catalysts host Julie Hyman tracks several of the day's top trending stock tickers, including the rise in homebuilder sentiment in the month of December, Exor rejecting Tether Holdings offer for its 65% stake in the Juventus Football Club (JUV.F), and Goldman Sachs giving Teradyne (TER) a double upgrade. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.
